Instruction: In a large bowl, combine cubed watermelon, diced cucumber, chopped jalapeno pepper, thinly sliced red onion, and chopped fresh cilantro.
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, honey, and salt to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad ingredients and toss gently to combine.
Refrigerate the spicy watermelon salad for at least 20 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld.
Serve chilled as a zesty side dish.
